survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness of the current employee wellness programs and identify areas for improvement to enhance employee well-being and productivity.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with the wellness programs offered by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure familiarity levels.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with the wellness programs offered by your employer?

questions.question_text: Which of the following wellness programs have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture participation across different programs.

script.question_text: Which of the following wellness programs have you participated in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the wellness programs you have participated in?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any program in Q2 except 'None of the above'
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the wellness programs you have participated in?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any program in Q2 except 'None of the above'

questions.question_text: What benefits have you experienced from participating in the wellness programs?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any program in Q2 except 'None of the above'
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse benefits.

script.question_text: What benefits have you experienced from participating in the wellness programs?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any program in Q2 except 'None of the above'

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in wellness programs?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to measure participation rates.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in wellness programs?

questions.question_text: What barriers prevent you from participating in wellness programs? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Programs not relevant to my needs
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Rarely' or 'Never' in Q5
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to identify common barriers.

script.question_text: What barriers prevent you from participating in wellness programs? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Programs not relevant to my needs
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Rarely' or 'Never' in Q5

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the wellness programs to a colleague?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any program in Q2 except 'None of the above'
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure recommendation likelihood.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the wellness programs to a colleague?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any program in Q2 except 'None of the above'

questions.question_text: What additional wellness programs would you like to see offered?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What additional wellness programs would you like to see offered?

questions.question_text: How has participation in wellness programs impacted your overall job satisfaction?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any program in Q2 except 'None of the above'
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure impact on job satisfaction.

script.question_text: How has participation in wellness programs impacted your overall job satisfaction?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any program in Q2 except 'None of the above'

questions.question_text: Do you feel that the wellness programs are adequately promoted within the company?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure perception of promotion efforts.
